name: Deepansh Singh

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: • Identified key metrics and analyzed cloud data of 20,000+ customer scooters for baselining existing range estimation accuracy.• Interacted with over 40 daily active users to better understand the actual user experience around the instances of range drop issues.• Analysed NMC cell behaviour to develop a hypothesis for the root cause of range drop issues based on customer data and user feedback.• Defined test cases and ran experiments on 40 test scooters for validating the root cause hypothesis based on the test data collected.• Backtested the proposed heuristic range estimation model using test data yielding an estimation accuracy improvement of 6.5%.
experience.description_html: • Identified key metrics and analyzed cloud data of 20,000+ customer scooters for baselining existing range estimation accuracy.• Interacted with over 40 daily active users to better understand the actual user experience around the instances of range drop issues.• Analysed NMC cell behaviour to develop a hypothesis for the root cause of range drop issues based on customer data and user feedback.• Defined test cases and ran experiments on 40 test scooters for validating the root cause hypothesis based on the test data collected.• Backtested the proposed heuristic range estimation model using test data yielding an estimation accuracy improvement of 6.5%.

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: • Independently shipped major student pod modules like day-over-day progress card and Lido community dashboard• Devised productized solutions and operational improvements increasing the new user reward redemption KPI by 22% in 3 months• Facilitated the addressal of escalations from customer success team concerning the students by providing required product solutions• Jointly prepared the student product walkthrough document covering details of all features and functionalities of the student product• Performed in-depth pre-release QA and user acceptance testing of major modules on both staging as well as production environment.
experience.description_html: • Independently shipped major student pod modules like day-over-day progress card and Lido community dashboard• Devised productized solutions and operational improvements increasing the new user reward redemption KPI by 22% in 3 months• Facilitated the addressal of escalations from customer success team concerning the students by providing required product solutions• Jointly prepared the student product walkthrough document covering details of all features and functionalities of the student product• Performed in-depth pre-release QA and user acceptance testing of major modules on both staging as well as production environment.

experience.title: Spring Fest

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: • Co-lead a team of 35 core members and coordinated with 9 cross-functional teams to successfully organize the fest amidst pandemic• Conceptualized the first-ever SF Jukebox, which hosted 2 International bands and Rajasthan's folk culture resulting in a turnout of 5000+• Individually garnered a sponsorship amount of INR 4.5 Lakhs through 8 corporate deals, leading to a budget of INR 35L• Strategized marketing initiatives and branding avenues for sponsors on the online platform reducing the cost of branding by 75% YoY
positions.title: Sponsorship and Marketing Head
positions.description_html:
• Co-lead a team of 35 core members and coordinated with 9 cross-functional teams to successfully organize the fest amidst pandemic
• Conceptualized the first-ever SF Jukebox, which hosted 2 International bands and Rajasthan's folk culture resulting in a turnout of 5000+
• Individually garnered a sponsorship amount of INR 4.5 Lakhs through 8 corporate deals, leading to a budget of INR 35L
• Strategized marketing initiatives and branding avenues for sponsors on the online platform reducing the cost of branding by 75% YoY

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: • Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 2.25 lakhs through 5 corporate deals, alumni contributions, and food stall associations• Raised a total amount of INR 9.81 lakhs, resulting in a 14% YoY increment, by coordinating the sponsorship drive in Delhi• Supervised the management, planning, and execution of procurement and logistics of complete inventory for150+ events at18 venues

experience.title: Financial Risk Analyst Intern
experience.description: • Carried out extensive research on Financial Risk Profiling methods and identified best practices for building a risk tolerance questionnaire• Devised a response validation framework using a correlational mapping between user responses to ensure internal consistency• Developed a risk tolerance questionnaire and checked its validity and reliability based on International Psychometric Standards• Built a machine learning model using KNN Algorithm (K Nearest Neighbour) for the classification of the client's Financial Risk Tolerance
experience.description_html: • Carried out extensive research on Financial Risk Profiling methods and identified best practices for building a risk tolerance questionnaire• Devised a response validation framework using a correlational mapping between user responses to ensure internal consistency• Developed a risk tolerance questionnaire and checked its validity and reliability based on International Psychometric Standards• Built a machine learning model using KNN Algorithm (K Nearest Neighbour) for the classification of the client's Financial Risk Tolerance
